column4: when i play the xmoto game in fullscreen, after a few minutes the screensaver seems to kick in.. how can i prevent that without disabling it?
at least it seems to be the screensaver, the game switches to windowed and when i move the mouse goes back to fullscreen
simple method would be doing a "killall xscreensaver" before starting the game
and run xscreensaver-settings afterwards from the menu
